com.guardtime.ksi

Interface Signer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KSI

    public interface Signer
extends Closeable
    An instance of this class can be obtained using SignerBuilder class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(byte[] bytes)
      This method is used to sign a byte array asynchronously.
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash)
      This method is used to sign data hash asynchronously.
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(File file)
      This method is used to sign a file asynchronously.
      AggregatorConfiguration getAggregatorConfiguration()
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSISigningService.getAggregationConfiguration() in pair with KSISigningService.registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. One can acquire instance of KSISigningService which a KSI instance uses by calling getSigningService().
      KSISigningService getSigningService()
      This method is used to get the signing service that the SDK was initialized with.
      KSISignature sign(byte[] bytes)
      This method is used to sign a byte array.
      KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash)
      This method is used to sign data hash.
      KSISignature sign(File file)
      This method is used to sign a file.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash)
           throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign data hash.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(File file)
           throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign a file. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        file - file to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(byte[] bytes)
           throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign a byte array. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash)
                        throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign data hash asynchronously. Use method Future.getResult() to get keyless signature.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of Future
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(File file)
                        throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign a file asynchronously. Use method Future.getResult() to get keyless signature. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        file - file to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of Future
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(byte[] bytes)
                        throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign a byte array asynchronously. Use method Future.getResult() to get keyless signature. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        bytes - file to sign. not null.
        Returns:
        instance of Future
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • getSigningService

        KSISigningService getSigningService()
        This method is used to get the signing service that the SDK was initialized with. One could use the signing service to get access to its configuration for example.

      • getAggregatorConfiguration

        @Deprecated
AggregatorConfiguration getAggregatorConfiguration()
                                                        throws KSIException
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSISigningService.getAggregationConfiguration() in pair with KSISigningService.registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. One can acquire instance of KSISigningService which a KSI instance uses by calling getSigningService().
        GetAggregatorConfiguration method is used to ask aggregation configuration from KSI gateway/aggregator.Only supported if PduVersion.V2 is used.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If KSI is initialized with a service not a client.
        KSIException
